احصاء سكشن: The labor force represents about half of the total population (49.5% in 2010, 50.7% in 2008 and 51% in 2001) and almost the same proportion to the working-age population (51.5% in 2010, and 53% in 2008 and 2001). In 2008, the last year for which complete statistics are available, the percentage of salaried workers amounted to approximately 41.5% of the total population, followed by private business owners (about 56%) and employers at 2.5%. There is a large percentage of unpaid workers (in family businesses). Unemployment is estimated at 10% of the total workforce, and the same percentage for women and men, although statistics on the informal economy and rural areas are inaccurate.
